summary: Leria is a Destruction Mage Follower inspired by one of Shocky's characters.  Preset/Sculpt by Eluthor; Follower conversion by me.  Leria is available in CBBE and SeveNBase; Base and HDT; Armor and No Armor versions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/y19trh7d3/LeriaTitleImage.png[/img]

Permission granted for follower creation by [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/939822-eluthor/]Eluthor
[/url](Inspired by Shocky's Arielle)

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/waotlvslj/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Leria
Race:  Custom Imperial/Breton Based
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.03
Weight:  0
Body:  CBBE & SeveNBase
Skin:  Fair Skin Optimized
Armor:  Daedric Chainmail
Weapons:  Magic & Battle Claws
Location:  Windhelm Marketplace

Class:  Mage Destruction
Style:  Human Magic

Levels with player
Spells:  Custom Conjure Death Hound & Vanilla Shock Related Spells

Tested with AFT & EFF
ENBs Pictured in Screenshots:  RealVision & Vividian

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/klmt20yvb/Action.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/egtbkl9jb/Requirements.png[/img]
[b][u]All Versions[/u][/b]

Dawnguard

[b][u]Armor/HDT Versions[/u][/b]

HDT Physics
HDT Compatible Skeleton

[b][u]Base SeveNBase Version
[/u][/b]
BBP/TBBP Compatible Skeleton

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kt8gufclj/Recommended.png[/img]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/4pvzumb2f/KnownIssues.png[/img]
[/url]Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Boots may sink through ground at times due to no High Heels effect.
Giving her vanilla Daedric Boots will fix this issue.

Armor was designed to be worn together; you may experience seams when
mixing & matching.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/ka5cp9ifb/OpenArms.jpg[/img]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/4m26ed5l3/FAQ.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  Not without expression permission from Eluthor

Q:  Why isn't she using her Battle Claws?
A:  She won't use them unless she runs out of magic.
A:  Unarmed is her backup skill; she's setup as a mage.

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*?
A:  My apologies but this is not my character so I will not make changes to appearance.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.
A:  I will probably refuse any little girl/boy looking follower requests though.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
